effect: The holder gains the Arcanist trait.
name: Arcanist Emblem

effect: The holder gains the Assassin trait.
name: Assassin Emblem

effect: The holder gains the Challenger trait.
name: Challenger Emblem

effect: The holder gains the Chemtech trait.
name: Chemtech Emblem

effect: The holder gains the Debonair trait.
name: Debonair Emblem

effect: The holder gains the Hextech trait.
name: Hextech Emblem

effect: The holder gains the Mutant trait.
name: Mutant Emblem

effect: The holder gains the Striker trait.
name: Striker Emblem

effect: During combat, the holder gains 25 Ability Power every 5 seconds.
name: Archangel's Staff

effect: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain a shield that blocks the damage and effects of the first enemy Ability, up to 600 damage.
name: Banshee's Claw

effect:
Physical damage heals the holder for 33% of the damage dealt.

    Upon falling below 40% Health, the holder gains a 30% max Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.
name: Bloodthirster

effect: The holder gains 50 Mana (including components). After casting their Ability, the holder gains 20 mana.
name: Blue Buff

effect: Grants 70 bonus Armor (including components). Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by an attack, deal 60/80/120 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).
name: Bramble Vest

effect: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 30 Ability Power for the rest of combat.
name: Chalice of Power

effect: The holder gains 50/75/100 ★ bonus Attack Damage (including components).
name: Deathblade

effect: Grants 200 bonus Magic Resist (including components). On being hit by magic or true damage from an Ability, launch a fireball at the Ability's caster that deals magic damage equal to 18% of their max Health (0.5 second cooldown).
name: Dragon's Claw

effect: When the holder first drops below 50% health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding negative effects. After coming out of stealth, the holder gains an additional 40% bonus Attack Speed
name: Edge of Night

effect: Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 35%.
name: Frozen Heart

effect: The holder gains 18 Armor and 18 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.
name: Gargoyle Stoneplate

effect: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 20% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1600 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 60%.
name: Giant Slayer

effect:
Attacks grant +6% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

    This effect can stack any number of times.
name: Guinsoo's Rageblade

effect:
The holder gains both of the following:
    • +10 Attack Damage and +10 Ability Power.
    • Attacks and Abilities heal for 10% of damage dealt.
    
    At the beginning of each planning phase, one of these buffs is increased to 33%.
name: Hand of Justice

effect: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for 33% of the damage dealt. The holder also heals their lowest health ally for the same amount.
name: Hextech Gunblade

effect: The holder gains 75% Critical Strike Chance and 10% Critical Strike Damage. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage.
name: Infinity Edge

effect: Enemies within 3 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 200% of their max Mana.
name: Ionic Spark

effect: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains 40% bonus Critical Strike Damage and 10 bonus Ability Power.
name: Jeweled Gauntlet

effect: When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.
name: Last Whisper

effect: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 300/350/400 ★ damage for 15 seconds.
name: Locket of the Iron Solari Whisper

effect: When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 20% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.
name: Morellonomicon

effect: The holder gains 20% bonus Attack Speed. The holder is immune to crowd control in combat for 15 seconds.
name: Quicksilver

effect: The holder gains 75 bonus Ability Power (including components).
name: Rabadon's Deathcap

effect:
Increases the holder's Attack Range by 1 hex and grants 55% bonus Attack Speed (including components).

    The holder's attacks can no longer miss.
name: Rapid Firecannon

effect: Every 5 seconds, the holder radiates an aura to allies within 1 hex, healing them for 18% of their missing Health. Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from multi-target abilities and attacks for 5 seconds.
name: Redemption

effect: The holder gains 15 bonus Attack Damage. The holder's attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% of the wearer's Attack Damage as physical damage.
name: Runaan's Hurricane

effect: When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first cast, increasing their max Mana by 35% until they cast.
name: Shroud of Stillness

effect: The holder's attacks restore 8 additional Mana.
name: Spear of Shojin

effect: The holder gains 10% bonus Attack Speed. Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 70 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.
name: Statikk Shiv

effect: Every 2 seconds, a random enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 16% of their maximum health as true damage over 8 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.
name: Sunfire Cape

effect: Wearer's team gains +1 maximum team size.
name: Tactician's Crown

effect: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.
name: Thief's Gloves

effect:
When the holder attacks or takes damage, they gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power. 

    This stacks up to 25 times, at which point the holder gains 25 Armor and Magic Resist.
name: Titan's Resolve

effect: Grants 1000 bonus Health (including components).
name: Warmog's Armor

effect: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
name: Zeke's Herald

effect: When combat begins, the holder summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.
name: Zephyr

effect:
At the start of combat, the holder taunts enemies within 4 hexes. 

    When the holder dies, a Voidspawn arises taunting nearby enemies.
name: Zz'Rot Portal
